org.redpin.android.ui.list
Class SearchListActivity

java.lang.Object
  ListActivity
      org.redpin.android.ui.list.SearchListActivity

public class SearchListActivity
extends ListActivity

ListActivity that displays Locations grouped by Maps an lets the user search them.

Author:
Luba Rogoleva (lubar@student.ethz.ch), Pascal Brogle (broglep@student.ethz.ch)
